page.title: 07Sigglesthorne School
page.content: There has been a school at {Sigglesthorne}since the early 18th Century. The present school building was built in{1861}and since then many additions and improvements have been added. The latest improvements were completed in 1984 when indoor toilets and an assembly hall were created. Children come to this school from the age of five and leave at the age of eleven to transfer to secondary school at{Hornsea.}There are{45} children at the school with two full time and two part time teachers. Most children walk to school from the villages of{Seaton}and {Sigglesthorne}but some children are brought from outlying farms by car. The school at{Catwick}closed in 1923 but the children from Catwick go the Leven school.
